rows.label: bf11340100_0010
rows.name: That wasn't like you.

rows.label: bf11340100_0015
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Bitter laugh

rows.label: bf11340100_0020
rows.name: Did it look that way to you?

rows.label: bf11340100_0030
rows.name: Yes.

rows.label: bf11340100_0035
rows.name:
I always thought you were the kind of person
who never had any doubts.

rows.label: bf11340100_0040
rows.name: I try to be, anyway.

rows.label: bf11340100_0045
rows.name: The truth is, I'm always struggling with it.

rows.label: bf11340100_0050
rows.name: Ever since I became Hikari's Driver.

rows.label: bf11340100_0060
rows.name: It didn't seem that way at all.

rows.label: bf11340100_0070
rows.name: You need to be worthy to wield great power.

rows.label: bf11340100_0075
rows.name: Especially when it's the Heaven's Holy Grail.

rows.label: bf11340100_0080
rows.name:
When we first met,
I came this close to burning you all to ash.

rows.label: bf11340100_0090
rows.name: Fortunately, thanks to Shin, that was avoided, but...

rows.label: bf11340100_0100
rows.name: So is that why you left the resistance?

rows.label: bf11340100_0110
rows.name: As long as I can't fully control Hikari's power...

rows.label: bf11340100_0120
rows.name: I might end up getting many soldiers killed...

rows.label: bf11340100_0130
rows.name: That's what I was afraid of.

rows.label: bf11340100_0140
rows.name: This whole tragedy with Metsu...

rows.label: bf11340100_0150
rows.name:
it might have all started because
Deacon Marveni couldn't control him.

rows.label: bf11340100_0160
rows.name: If that's true, then someday, I might...

rows.label: bf11340100_0170
rows.name: I think she gets it.

rows.label: bf11340100_0180
rows.name: She's just bad at expressing it.

rows.label: bf11340100_0190
rows.name: Is that your take on it?

rows.label: bf11340100_0200
rows.name:
Well, I have been partners with Shin,
the so-called secret treasure of Iira, for 17 years.

rows.label: bf11340100_0210
rows.name:
I can tell how much power a Blade is using
just by watching them move.

rows.label: bf11340100_0220
rows.name: She's making sure you don't[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: bf11340100_0230
rows.name: No, she's holding back so she doesn't lose control.

rows.label: bf11340100_0235
rows.name: She's kind, deep down.

rows.label: bf11340100_0240
rows.name: I see...

rows.label: bf11340100_0245
rows.name: If that's true, then I guess I'm still just half a man.

rows.label: bf11340100_0250
rows.name: Don't beat yourself up.

rows.label: bf11340100_0260
rows.name: You just have to get used to it little by little.

rows.label: bf11340100_0265
rows.name: I was the same.

rows.label: bf11340100_0270
rows.name: Let's just hope time is on our side.

rows.label: bf11340100_0280
rows.name: Yeah...
